name: Vektropolis (Canceled)
blurb: Vektropolis is a new type of fast-paced, action game with a clean retro style. 80's look, 21st century feel and Oculus Rift support

rewards.reward: No Reward
Pledge \u00a31 and have our sincere thanks and appreciation for supporting our indie project
Pledge \u00a35 and we'll give you a special thanks credit in the game. This is optional and all backers from this tier upwards will receive this.

Support Vektropolis! Get a digital code that will unlock  a specially designed craft, which is unique to backers. Also receive a special insignia on the persistent online score tables to indicate you\u2019re a backer. The code will be available from the first time you can access the game, this includes closed testing mentioned in other pledges. Plus rewards in previous pledge.

Reserve a digital copy of the game and save \u00a35 on the launch cost of the game, plus all rewards above. Remember, you pay only once so nothing to pay forever after that for any of the massive updates and new content we have planned. Plus rewards from previous pledges.
Have special vehicle type unlocked in your digital copy without grinding! Plus rewards from previous pledges.

We've just announced a Tablet version. Get in there early with Early Access Beta for Android / iOS. Early adopters will get a copy of the game with a special accent for their account. Plus rewards from previous pledges (where applicable to phones / tablets).

Be part our our early compatibility testing, this means getting versions of the game that won't play properly or perhaps even work on your video chip set. You will share our pain and gain access before the early access beta and is an essential step to getting to the beta version. We'd like you to send reports (i.e. whether it runs or not, screen shots, performance stats etc.). Plus all the rewards above
Be part of our Oculus Rift beta testing. Plus all rewards above.

Get in there early with Early Access Beta which may contain bugs some of which will be quite horrible we're sure. \r\nEarly adopters will get a copy of the game with a special accent for their account. Plus rewards from previous pledges.
Get downloadable copy of DRM free soundtrack to the game Vektropolis and a copy of the game with a special accent for their account. Plus rewards from previous pledges.

Get in there early and get an in game credit as QA (Quality Assurance) when you sign up for our test program. You get a copy of the game and unique accent for your account at this level. \r\nGet special access to our forums and help shape and improve the game. Plus rewards from previous pledges.

Participate in the close beta program. Credited in the game as Closed Beta QA.  when you sign up for the closed beta program - play the game before anyone else! Also gain access to vehicle customising tools to make appearance of your craft unique.\r\nIncludes a copy of the game, access to our and private forums. Plus rewards from previous pledges.
Receive one of a limited number of special Vektropolis T-Shirts (different sizes will be available). Plus all rewards above
Receive one of a limited number of special Vektropolis Hoodies (different sizes will be available). Plus all rewards above

Design your own custom graffiti which will appear somewhere on the walls of the buildings. We will provide bespoke tools for you to do this. Submit it and provided it's not likely to cause offence we'll include it. Artwork will remain in the game for at least 12 months after delivery. Plus all rewards above.

Have a bigger canvas and design your own billboards, these can include neon lighting and animations if required. We will provide bespoke tools for you to do this. Submit it and provided it's not likely to cause offence we'll include it. These can include personal messages or business related messages. Artwork will remain in the game for at least 12 months after delivery. Plus all rewards above.
Have your own personal special thanks message placed in the game's credits, with an additional associate producer credit. Nothing offensive please. Plus all rewards above.

The same as the previous pledge except each level will have places of prominence reserved for always displaying one of these billboards (hence the very limited number). There's no way of knowing what the player will do though we can guarantee that anyone who even plays for a short while will see one of these! Plus all the rewards above.
Have a unique enemy craft added and by us and named by you. Appropriate names only. Also get a credit as an 'Executive Producer' in the game. Plus all the rewards above.
